inclusion.criterion: Participants with history neck of more than 3 months with no related conditions
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: NPRS-Numeric Pain Rating Scale Score 1 & 2 and score 9 & 10
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: NDI- Neck Disability Index : Score 0 to 4 (no disability) and score 35 to 50(Complete disability)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarettes and consumes alcohol. He is not aware of his family history.
